caption.p: Congenital Zika virus infection induces major changes in the human thymic epithelial network. Representative images of ( a) Hematoxylin-eosin and ( b) cytokeratin staining of paraffin-embedded human thymus sections. A control case, case 6 with intermediate alterations and case 2 with severe alterations in the human thymic epithelial network are represented (n = 2 for controls and n = 6 for congenital ZIKV infection). Arrows show some of the Hassal’s corpuscles. C: cortical region; M: medullary region.
